1: <sup>1</sup> Now these were the sons of David, which were born unto him in Hebron; the firstborn Amnon, of Ahinoam the Jezreelitess; the second Daniel, of Abigail the Carmelitess:
2: <sup>2</sup> The third, Absalom the son of Maachah the daughter of Talmai king of Geshur: the fourth, Adonijah the son of Haggith:
3: <sup>3</sup> The fifth, Shephatiah of Abital: the sixth, Ithream by Eglah his wife.
4: <sup>4</sup> These six were born unto him in Hebron; and there he reigned seven years and six months: and in Jerusalem he reigned thirty and three years.
5: <sup>5</sup> And these were born unto him in Jerusalem; Shimea, and Shobab, and Nathan, and Solomon, four, of Bathshua the daughter of Ammiel:
6: <sup>6</sup> Ibhar also, and Elishama, and Eliphelet,
7: <sup>7</sup> And Nogah, and Nepheg, and Japhia,
8: <sup>8</sup> And Elishama, and Eliada, and Eliphelet, nine.
9: <sup>9</sup> These were all the sons of David, beside the sons of the concubines, and Tamar their sister.
10: <sup>10</sup> And Solomon’s son was Rehoboam, Abia his son, Asa his son, Jehoshaphat his son,
11: <sup>11</sup> Joram his son, Ahaziah his son, Joash his son,
12: <sup>12</sup> Amaziah his son, Azariah his son, Jotham his son,
13: <sup>13</sup> Ahaz his son, Hezekiah his son, Manasseh his son,
14: <sup>14</sup> Amon his son, Josiah his son.
15: <sup>15</sup> And the sons of Josiah were, the firstborn Johanan, the second Jehoiakim, the third Zedekiah, the fourth Shallum.
16: <sup>16</sup> And the sons of Jehoiakim: Jeconiah his son, Zedekiah his son.
17: <sup>17</sup> And the sons of Jeconiah; Assir, Salathiel his son,
18: <sup>18</sup> Malchiram also, and Pedaiah, and Shenazar, Jecamiah, Hoshama, and Nedabiah.
19: <sup>19</sup> And the sons of Pedaiah were, Zerubbabel, and Shimei: and the sons of Zerubbabel; Meshullam, and Hananiah, and Shelomith their sister:
20: <sup>20</sup> And Hashubah, and Ohel, and Berechiah, and Hasadiah, Jushabhesed, five.
21: <sup>21</sup> And the sons of Hananiah; Pelatiah, and Jesaiah: the sons of Rephaiah, the sons of Arnan, the sons of Obadiah, the sons of Shechaniah.
22: <sup>22</sup> And the sons of Shechaniah; Shemaiah: and the sons of Shemaiah; Hattush, and Igeal, and Bariah, and Neariah, and Shaphat, six.
23: <sup>23</sup> And the sons of Neariah; Elioenai, and Hezekiah, and Azrikam, three.
24: <sup>24</sup> And the sons of Elioenai were, Hodaiah, and Eliashib, and Pelaiah, and Akkub, and Johanan, and Dalaiah, and Anani, seven.
